item.title: Cypress | Explain like I'm 5
item.description: Key points to mention: Integration Test Automation (perhaps mention the other kinds, the test pyramid) Why is it useful (takes away the effort of manual tests) Automatically take screenshots / videos How to install cypress Supported websites Basic get commands (data-cy) How to run the tests Docs Demo branch Mention cypress dashboard Subscribe Have you ever wondered what Cypress is but never got to look deeper into it?
